description:
Tytuł/Topic: Packaging Python applications 
Prelegent/Speaker: Piotr Banaszkiewicz

In this talk I'll go through history and future of Python packaging. I will also introduce the audience to the ways of dealing with system-wide installed applications (ie. Debian and RPM packages).

http://pl.pycon.org/2013/pl/agenda
title: Packaging Python applications
